import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import UserCard from '../util/UserCard' import Card from '../util/Card' import {BsBookmarkDash} from 'react-icons/bs' import styles from './SavedPost.module.css' const SavedPost = ({post}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {auth} = useSelector(state => state) const unsaveHander = () => { dispatch(unsavePost(auth, post._id)) } return (
{ post.media.length > 0 ? (post.media[0].url.match(/video/i) ?
) } export default SavedPost
